name: Brand New Matter
tagline: Talk to us before you engage a Dev Shop!
description: Brand New Matter is a strategic advisory firm founded by Priceline.com and Kayak.com founding team members. Through our pre-product workshop, we save entrepreneurs hundreds of thousands of dollars on product builds that go sideways. Working with us prior to a build is one of the best things you can do for your business - through our engagement, you will understand what really matters, what doesn't, how to make your new business extremely successful.
